Text: How to install in the Skidrow version (Ver#0061)?
put files in to Worms RevolutionDLC

No install instructions, there is no "DLC" folder in the game where one could just copy these files. I've tried putting the "Funfair_DLC" folder in the game's root folder, but that doesn't work. Thankfully though, the download was small and fast, so I can just shift+delete the whole thing and move on with my life without much care.

WORKED FOR ME
thanks!!!
(Skidrow Ver #0061)
Just put the files in Worms RevolutionDLC and play
But where's is path "Worms RevolutionDLC", i create a path in the main installation folder with this name and put the files, but nothing changes in the game...

Works perfectly. Just put it in C:Program Files (x86)Worms RevolutionDLCDLC_Funfair

Please torrent the Mars DLC pack as well!
